about_the_game:
Tales of the Cryptozoo is a third-person puzzle game that immerses players in a psychological horror experience. You will take on the role of Elizabeth, an investigator who ventures into a dark world filled with mystery and terrifying creatures. Your mission is to solve challenging puzzles, gather essential clues, and carefully navigate dangerous environments while evading lethal enemies lurking in every corner.

Each level presents puzzles that require keen observation, strategic thinking, and the collection of clues to progress. As you explore, you’ll uncover details about a series of unexplained murders and hidden secrets. The tension builds as you delve into shadowy areas, facing your fears and staying alert to avoid being caught.

Key Features:

  • Third-person puzzle gameplay with a deep, immersive narrative.

  • Gather clues and solve puzzles to advance through the story.

  • Face unique enemies that test your skills to dodge and survive.

  • Dark, atmospheric environments exploring different types of phobias.

  • Unlock new secrets as you progress in a world filled with mysteries.

Do you have the courage to face the horrors of Tales of the Cryptozoo and uncover the truth hidden in the darkness?

name: Tales of the Cryptozoo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 o superior.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ @ 2.5 GHz.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 o superior.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300HQ @ 2.5 GHz.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Explore, investigate, and survive in a dark world of cryptozoology, where each creature brings its own kind of terror. Will you uncover the truth or succumb to the horrors lurking in the shadows?
